name: Chemistry Lab Simulator
description:
Chemistry Lab. Simulator (CLS) is an educational game that simulates a chemistry lab with all the necessary elements to carry out experiments and practical exercises in a playful environment.
The game consists of presenting challenges to the player who can try to solve them with their knowledge or try a step by step of resolution in order to study the presented challenge.

CLS also gives players challenges and allows them to use elements normally used in real laboratories in mini-games that will represent different processes, such as state change, mixing, separating mixtures of different shapes, chemical balances, among many others, all in a dynamic and fun way.

The android version is quite old but shows part of the ideas we had for the game/simulator.
